name: LA TEVA WEB SL
tagline: Barcelona Web Design and Online Marketing Agency
description:
LA TEVA SL was founded in Barcelona with the mission of efficiently introducing companies of all sizes and resources on the internet, at an affordable price and taking care of the whole process. The company has extensive experience in the design and the creation of web pages and has specialized in consultancy and the introduction of small and medium companies to the internet. The team of LA TEVA WEB SL also has experience as a marketing and strategy consultants for large companies.
